snippet: Communications chipmaker Broadcom Ltd is planning to unveil a bid for smartphone chip supplier Qualcomm Inc by Monday, three sources familiar with the matter said on Friday, an attempt to create a roughly $200-billion company through the biggest t...

headline.main: Broadcom Plans Record Tech Deal With Qualcomm Bid: Sources
headline.print_headline: Broadcom Plans Record Tech Deal With Qualcomm Bid: Sources
